channel.title: Hybridscape Plans
channel.description:
This will be [b]A Complete Rewrite[/b]
Servers:
[ul][li]GameServer[/li] [li]Central LoginServer[/li] [li]Central ChatServer[/li] [li]Web Server[/li][/ul]
GameServer: More detail later.
Central LoginServer: will store all user data for all connecting servers. this gives the ability to run a working private chat. Of course it can be option for use because some like to have complete control.
Central ChatServer: will handle private chat.
Web Server: Will give the users alittle webspace to host their webclient as well as what ever else they wanted. also possibly use a hybridscape.com subdomain, this will come in handy for cache manipulation.
Other Tools: Cache manipulation - im looking foward to finish this off, latly ive been trying to understand the runescape cache. theirs still some kinks i have um repacking and writing, but i do have reading down for some stuff. as for 3d models that would be alot harder, ive been looking at bentski model viewer. (i have no experience with 3d) so ill be looking into j3d and we can look into this more.
Moparisthebest - if you want i will by hybridscape.com from you ill talk to you about it in irc.

item.title: Hybridscape Plans
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

moparisthebest:

It would be easy to do that with php using a mysql database.

thats what i plan

Read full topic

item.title: Hybridscape Plans
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

It would be easy to do that with php using a mysql database.

Read full topic

item.title: Hybridscape Plans
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

i plan too yes. , i am having a problem using librarys with idea though lol >.<, id also like to move away from the use of doing everything by ingame commands. and rather have a php script that can access each servers table to do config changing.

Read full topic

item.title: Hybridscape Plans
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I definitely love the way they handle packets, but haven’t looked much at the rest. Are you storing things with an SQL database?

Read full topic

item.title: Hybridscape Plans
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

um not entirely, i like some things about rscd, and some things i don’t. I really like their way of packet handling so i think i would like to use that. however i feel the bunch of them made somethings alot more difficult then it had to be. it may be that it was because it was a rsc server, and rsc seems to require alot more server side information. items ect. but i would like to write some things on my own as well.

Read full topic

item.title: Hybridscape Plans
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Are you planning on using RSCD as a base?

Read full topic
